item.description:
Also, it is my birthday right before the event, so it gives me the chance to extend my celebration. And due to some unforeseen circumstances, Ben is now agreeing to open his house for it as mine is not quite ready for game day.


I would like anyone who RSVPs to please have a name and pic up, otherwise I will remove you from the RSVP  (we have over 600 members and a lot of repeated names, so I want to make sure i know which person it is)  Shiny, you are an exception.  I know where you live. i will send an email with my address prior to the event to the attendees.
item.why: It was my birthday, and I wanna play!
item.name: Becki's Game Day at Ben's House!
